title: WTB T205 Matthewson or Johnson gold border
author: mebu22

posts.post_title: WTB T205 Matthewson or Johnson gold border
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to do a cash or cash/trade deal for one of the following that I want to pick up for my collection:


T205 Christy Mathewson, gold border – low to mid grade, no holes or creases

T205 Walter Johnson, gold border – low to mid grade, in focus, no holes or creases

I would be open to ones graded authentic as well. I don't care about the company on the back... I'd prefer the more common ones.
